title: Chengxin Xu
text:
Research Areas



Administrative Burden & Service Access


Why eligible people fail to receive benefits—and how to reduce frictions through design.


equity · take-up · street-level




Government Grantmaking & Nonprofits


How RFP and grant processes shape nonprofit capacity and public value.


RFP · compliance · capacity




AI in Government & Governance


Boundaries, governance, and risk controls for AI use in the public sector.


accountability · auditing · governance

title: Chengxin Xu
text:
Research Areas



Administrative Burden & Service Access


Why eligible people fail to receive services—and how to reduce frictions through process design.


equity · take-up · street-level




Government Grantmaking & Nonprofits


How RFP and grant processes shape nonprofit capacity, compliance, and public value.


RFP · compliance · capacity




AI in Government & Governance


Governance mechanisms, accountability, and risk controls for public-sector AI use.


accountability · auditing · governance

title: 研究 Research
section: 行政负担与公共服务获取
text:
行政负担与公共服务获取
问题（占位）为何“有资格却领不到”？
方法（占位）行政数据 + 实验/准实验 + 访谈/文本分析。
贡献（占位）提出可操作的流程改进并评估公平影响。
关键词：administrative burden; take-up; equity

title: 研究 Research
section: 政府资助与非营利组织治理
text:
政府资助与非营利组织治理
（占位）RFP 与拨款流程如何影响合规成本、能力建设与服务质量？

title: Chengxin Xu
text: English | 中文

title: Chengxin Xu
text:
Research Areas（研究方向）



行政负担与公共服务获取


解释人们为何“有资格却领不到”，并用流程设计降低负担。


equity · take-up · street-level




政府资助与非营利组织治理


研究 RFP/拨款流程如何影响非营利组织能力与公共价值。


RFP · compliance · capacity




政府 AI 应用与治理


关注 AI 的应用边界、治理机制与风险控制。


accountability · auditing · governance




(可选) 研究方向 4


占位：你可以再加 1–2 个方向。
